value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|No! To think I'd serve Hel... Have you
lost your mind?$k$p

$WmMEID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Enemy,Face|$w0|Listen well, Alfonse. If you waver
now, you lack the fortitude you
need to rule as King of Askr.$k$p

$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You may bare your fangs...but
you will be the ones dying here.
Hel cannot be killed, after all.$k$p
$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You will join the cohort of the dead...$k$p

$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I will give away everything to bring
my dead world back to life...even
sacrifice my other self.$k$p
